docs.snippet: British factory bosses are downbeat about the outlook for the economy after last year's Brexit vote even though they expect their sales both at home and abroad to improve in 2017, an industry survey showed on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: British factory bosses are downbeat about the outlook for the economy after last year's Brexit vote even though they expect their sales both at home and abroad to improve in 2017, an industry survey showed on Monday.

headline.main: UK Factory Bosses See Worse Economy but Better Sales in 2017-EEF
headline.print_headline: UK Factory Bosses See Worse Economy but Better Sales in 2017-EEF

docs.snippet: A hit squad made up of two teenage girls, a boy and a woman has been detained for allegedly killing three boys aged 13, 14 and 15 in a poor neighborhood of northern Mexico, authorities said Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A hit squad made up of two teenage girls, a boy and a woman has been detained for allegedly killing three boys aged 13, 14 and 15 in a poor neighborhood of northern Mexico, authorities said Sunday.

headline.main: Mexico Youth Gang Kills 3 Teens in Drug Dispute
headline.print_headline: Mexico Youth Gang Kills 3 Teens in Drug Dispute
